constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: KEYACH Name: Tolworth Key Area of Change
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Erection of hip to gable and rear roof dormer roof extensions with installation of 2no front roof lights to facilitate loft conversion
decision_conditions: The proposed erection of hip to gable and rear roof dormer roof extensions with the installation of 2no front roof lights to facilitate a loft conversion falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

With regard to Condition 10 (Construction Management Plan) the applicant is reminded of theirresponsibility to ensure that all necessary highways licenses/permits and temporary trafficmanagement orders (TTMOs) are in place at the appropriate times. It should also be noted that itis not permitted for any construction-related vehicle to park on St James Road or any other nearbyresidential road, other than in an authorised bay. Where possible staff should be encouraged tomake use of sustainable travel options.
The submitted proposed floor plans are not labelled as proposed and do not have annotated dimensions, please revise the proposed floor plans with correct labelling and dimensions.
